title: Designer urgently wanted to create some type in the EXACT Daft Punk 'Get Lucky' / 'Random Access Memories' style for a fee
content:
Hi,

I urgently need an illustrator / type designer to create some type in the EXACT Daft Punk 'Get Lucky' / 'Random Access Memories' type style for a reasonable fee.

This look heavily references the type also from Michael Jackson's 'Thriller' record cover.

Please only respond if you are 100% confident that you can get this quickly, exactly right.

It's two words that we need to be illustrated, in this exact style.

Suggestions of good illustrator / type designers who could quickly do this welcome, also.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311183502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/daft-punk-get-lucky-remix_6412.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311183502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Daft-Punk-Random-Access-Memories%20copy_4801.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311183502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RR0910_024_lg_3816.jpeg)
author: nicolasrandall

comments.content: And what is the budget and timeline?

If it is the based upon the same text as seen on the album cover Random Access Memories, I believe it is custom.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311183502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DPRAM_4804.jpg)

Please email me for a quote:  
hpapazian at gmail dot com

hhp
Probably bet to message the original poster directly when offering a quote, instead of posting a contact request. It will get to them sooner.

Except I've noticed that Typophile's direct messages sometimes get flagged as spam.

hhp
Through the Contact feature? Can you show/send me an example?

When I catch them I move them out of spam, so I can't send you an example (until it happens again). BTW now that Gmail is more complex it might behave differently.

hhp

"This is better than Cats. I'm going to see it over and over again."

Apologies for the delay. Thanks for all the messages, unfortunately personal messages went to my spam. I found an Australian designer on here who did the job for me. It was a lot of work took 2-3 days and he did for 500$ which was very kind of him.

I will keep you all in mind for quoting on future jobs.

Thanks again.

N
